com.example.android.camera2video

Class ConnectActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.example.android.camera2video.ConnectActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ConnectActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    This class takes in the connection information such as the IP address, port number, username and password for the laptop so that it can create a connection to the laptop and transfer to the camera portion of this application. If the connection to the laptop fails, the exceptions that caused the failure are displayed on screen.
    Version:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    Jonathan Westerfield

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the view and associates all of the view controls with class members in this class.

      • btnConnClk

        public void btnConnClk(android.view.View view)
        Handles the click event for the connect button. Once clicked, the phone should take the IP address in the IP address textbox and store the connection info for the laptop. Then the phone should open a TCP connection to the laptop to receive control signals.

      • switchToCameraActivity

        public void switchToCameraActivity()
        Switches to the camera activity.

      • showFailedConnectionAlert

        public void showFailedConnectionAlert(android.view.View view,
                                      String title,
                                      String message)
        An alert view that displays any exceptions that may have been thrown when trying to connect to the laptop.
        Parameters:
        view - The context that this alert will show on.
        title - The title of the alert.
        message - The message of for the cause of the alert.
